content.text: My father was a dry wall finisher.
That sounds like a tough job. My friends would be impressed by my cupcake recipe.
How do you make your cupcakes?
I start with a box mix, add my own flavors and ingredients, and bake them in my cupcake pan.
That sounds delicious. I like to go to the gym to lift weights, eat some healthy food, and then watch Magic Mike.
I'm going to be spending time with my family and friends, and relaxing.

That sounds great. I'm so grateful to have a family that supports my creative career.
I'm grateful for my family, and I enjoy spending time with them on holidays.
Me too. I'm a grandparent at 44.
That's amazing! I love to feel the warm sun on my skin and the salty sea air in my hair.
I enjoy cold winters and strong breezes.
I think we're pretty opposite when it comes to weather preferences.
Maybe we can learn something from each other
